oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Baldridge, John L, 1833 November 23
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of John L. Baldridge, dated November 23rd, 1833. Illustrates a page of the document. Baldridge’s will was recorded in the Davidson County Court in “Book No. 10, page 305 & 306 & Examined. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Baldridge family
